name: Viewing the History
title: Viewing the History
body:
Overview

This article explains how to view the history of changes and actions in EFS Secure Exchange, including what information is logged and how to search through the history.

 

Information

EFS Secure Exchange logs all important changes and actions, allowing users to track and review activities within the system.

  • Accessing the History
  • History Information
  • Customizing the View
  • Searching the History

 

Accessing the History

In order to view the list of changes, switch to the Users → Exchange teams → History menu

 

History Information

The history log provides the following information for each change:

Column heading Meaning
Date of change Date and time of change
Affected team The team affected by the change
Changes Short description of the change carried out
Changed by Name of the staff member who carried out the change

 

Customizing the View

Showing/Hiding Columns

1. Click on the "View" button 2. Select which columns to show or hide 3. Click "Submit" to apply changes

Sorting the Table

Click on any column heading to sort the table according to that column's contents.

 

Searching the History

Simple Search

The simple search function looks for the entered term in the "Changes" and "Changed by" fields.

Extended Search

The extended search allows you to:

  • Search for keywords in "Changes" and "Changed by" fields
  • Specify a certain change period
  • Limit the display to changes of a particular team

To clear search restrictions, click the "Reset" button.

 

FAQ

What kind of actions are logged in the history?

All important changes and actions executed using EFS Secure Exchange functions are logged. This includes file downloads, user actions, and team changes.

Can I export the history log?

The article doesn't mention an export function. For more information on exporting capabilities, please contact your system administrator or EFS Secure Exchange support.

How far back does the history go?

The article doesn't specify a time limit for the history log. Check with your system administrator for information about your organization's retention policy for history logs.
